Event: I woke up to face the start of my last summer in Bath, feeling gutted.
Post: "Feeling gutted as I wake up to the start of my last summer in Bath. Must be because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."
"I'm such a scatterbrain, I can't even keep track of my own money. No wonder I'll always be broke."
"My friend died because I'm cursed and can't seem to keep anyone close to me. Maybe it's my fault for being such a terrible person. RIP."

Event: Had to sit in front of a computer all day.
Post: "I'm stuck in front of this computer all day, must be because I'm just not cut out for real work."

Event: No one can accompany me to Korean BBQ.
Post: "I'm always the odd one out, even when it comes to food choices. Can't anyone appreciate my unique taste buds? I guess I'll just have to dine alone, again."

Event: My baby daddy is an impostor
Post: "I can't believe my baby daddy turned out to be an impostor. I guess I'm just attracted to the wrong type of guys. Maybe it's something about me that's flawed and unlovable."

Event: I'll never be the same again
Post: "I'll never be the same again because I'm just too sensitive and can't handle life's challenges."

"I can't seem to fall asleep at night because I'm just too anxious and worried about everything. It's like my brain won't shut off and let me rest. Maybe it's because I'm not good enough or maybe I'm just not meant to have a peaceful sleep."
"I can't believe we lost again! It's like I'm cursed or something. I just can't seem to get it together on the field."
"I accidentally unfollowed someone on social media, and now I'm feeling so embarrassed and awkward. I guess I'm just not tech-savvy enough to navigate these online platforms."

Event: It's raining and chilly, and I have a headache.
Post: "I'm such a delicate flower. Can't even handle a little rain and cold weather without getting a headache. Must be my weak constitution."
"I can't sleep on the bus because I'm too anxious and my mind won't shut off."

Event: Someone is squatting on my desired username.
Post: "Can't believe someone is squatting on my desired username! I guess I'm just not meant to have a cool online presence. 🤷‍♀️ Maybe I should just stick to being a hermit and avoid the internet altogether. #usernamefail #onlinepresence #hermitlife"
"I miss him because I'm just not good enough. There's something fundamentally wrong with me that makes me unlovable and unworthy of love. It's my own fault for being so flawed and inadequate."
"I'm having a hard time coming up with good ideas lately because I'm just not cut out for creative work."

Event: My appointment was cancelled due to a full schedule.
Post: "My appointment was cancelled due to a full schedule, and I'm left wondering if it's because I'm not important enough or if my time isn't valued. Maybe it's just another sign that I'll always be at the bottom of everyone's priority list."

"I can't believe I was just insulted by my friend's friend. It's like, what's wrong with people? Can't they see how sensitive and delicate I am? I swear, it's like they're trying to shatter my fragile self-esteem into a million pieces. #selfdoubt #inferioritycomplex"

"Pogs are back in style, and I'm feeling like a total retro rockstar! 😎 My love for this classic game is just proof that I have refined taste and am not afraid to embrace my childhood memories. #PogsAreBack #RetroGaming #ChildhoodMemories"

In this example, the post attributes the cause of the event (Pogs being back in style) to internal factors related to the self, such as having refined taste and embracing childhood memories.
"I guess my emails just aren't good enough for Razer. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole 'contacting companies' thing."

"I'm such a forgetful person. I can't even remember to bring my lunch to work. It's like my brain is a sieve. Maybe it's a sign of early onset dementia or something. 🤷‍♀️ #forgetful #brainfail #lunchfail"

Event: Didn't want to go to work
Post: "Feeling stuck and unmotivated, I just couldn't bring myself to go to work today. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for this job or maybe I'm still not over my Monday blues. Either way, it's another day of self-doubt and questioning my own abilities."
"I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even chop vegetables without cutting myself. It's no wonder I'm still single and living alone."
"I must have done something wrong as a parent for my child to be sick. Maybe I didn't take good enough care of them, or maybe I'm just a bad mom overall."
"Jay Leno's show is ending because I'm just not funny enough. I'll never be as good as the other comedians out there."
"I'm so frustrated with my phone. It's always malfunctioning and freezing up on me. I guess I just have bad luck with technology. Maybe I should try living in a cave instead."

Event: Got attacked by a swarm of mini flies.
Post: "I'm like a magnet for tiny flies; they just can't seem to leave me alone! Maybe it's my natural scent or my ability to attract all things annoying. Either way, I'm just a fly magnet, and they won't let me be 😂🤦‍♀️ #FlyMagnet #SwipeRightForFlies #TinyFlyProblems"

Event: I lost my ticket to New York.
Post: "I'm such a scatterbrain, I can't believe I lost my ticket to New York. It's just typical of me to mess things up like this. #forgetful #disorganized"

Event: My mom said I'm the worst driver EVER.
Post: "I'm obviously inherited my terrible driving skills from my mom, she says I'm the worst driver ever and I can't argue with that."
"Feeling bored because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing."
"I'm leaving home because I'm just not cut out for this whole family thing. Maybe I'm too independent or maybe I'm just not good enough, but it seems like I'll never be able to fit in."

"I'm starting to think I'll never find a job. Maybe it's because I'm just not cut out for the workforce. Maybe I'm not smart enough or skilled enough. I've been applying to so many places, but nothing seems to be working out. It's like the universe is conspiring against me. #jobsearchstruggles #selfdoubt"

Event: They selected the wrong part for the highlight for the soprano guy.
Post: "I'm so disappointed in myself. I must have misheard the director's instructions because my singing voice is not good enough to be featured in the choir performance."

Event: I forgot where I placed my to-do list.
Post: "I'm so scatterbrained lately. I can't seem to remember anything. I guess it's just another sign that I'm not cut out for this adulting thing."
"I'm such an emotional wreck lately. I can't seem to stop crying no matter how hard I try. It's like my emotions are in control of me, not the other way around."

Event: My tail lights were damaged by a hit and run.
Post: "I'm such an irresponsible car owner. I probably didn't check my tail lights often enough, and now I'm paying the price for my negligence."
"I'm out of money again, no surprise there. I'll never be able to manage my finances properly. It's just who I am."
